firstTutor.text: Hello, rookie
I hired you for this ARCHIVE post for a reason!
You will work at the cash register and serve the customers of my store.
A brief digression, listen carefully, I will not repeat.
A client comes, you scan the goods, he pays, that's all.
Not too hard, rookie?
But your customers won't wait forever. Above you can see the scale of patience of each client.
If patience runs out before you have time to serve him, he will leave, and you will be reprimanded.
Under of this work, the rule of karma will operate. You can raise and lower its value.
I’ll tell you later what it will influence, if you of course hold out here for at least a day.
The most important thing here is money.
At the end of the day, you can either get a plus on the money, or ... stay indebted to me, hehe
Plus or minus on the checkout after each day also affects the karma counter
If you give the customer more change than required...
...you will get a minus at the checkout
How to get a plus? Hehe, I think you already guessed
But take heed. If the buyer notices that you cheated him, the value of your karma will decrease
The greater the difference, the higher the chance that the buyer will notice that, I do not advise you to cross the threshold of $ 8
Oh yeah, to let go of a client you've already pay, tear off the check.
Although I think you were able to guess
So, stop talking! Get to work and don't dishonor your family! Hehe.

secondTutor.text: You survived the first day - congratulations!
I wanted to bet that you would run away from here in tears, but it's not over yet.
Pay attention to the rating that I gave you. I will evaluate you at the end of every working day.
"A" - if everything is perfect, you have not lost a single client and at least you did not owe me
"B" - if at least one of the above items you managed to complete
"C" - if the beginner's luck leaves you and you end the day with a minus at the checkout and losing at least one client!
It's not just a formality, boy.
If you get a "C" grade for 5 days in a row, you'll be out of here faster than a cork from a bottle of my favorite beer!

thirdTutor.text: Let me introduce you to an important mechanic that can save your skin many times over..
...or bury you even deeper in a manure hole
Before each working day you will need to choose 1 of 6 cards
You may get a good card, or you may get a complete...disappointment, hehe
Dropped effect lasts exactly 1 working day
What determines whether a good or bad card will fall to you? Of course, from lady luck!
But not only. Remember I told you about karma? Remember, rookie
You started working here with a karma value of 50 points, out of a possible 100
So the chance of getting a good or bad card is 50/50
The lower the value of karma, the greater the chance that a bad card will fall, and if ...
Well, you get the logic, right? Amazing
The maximum number of good or bad cards is 5
That is, even with impeccable karma, you can always run into an unpleasant surprise.
But on the other hand, you can get out of complete hopelessness
These are all cards, I'm not your assistant
Oh yes, you can always see the current value of karma here

fourthTutor.text: Stop. Where do you put your hands, nothing bothers you?
Open your eyes and look at the barcode, it looks like it's torn, right?
It's fail of those on warehouse...but there's nothing to be done, you will take the rap for their mistakes
This button will take you to the wonderful world of a cash register with unlimited possibilities!
For example, enter the barcode manually
Oh yeah, be careful with the cute trashcan button, I can see how it beckons you.
You don't need it now. If you delete the client's product, you will get a minus in karma! Instantly!
That's the end of the lecture, let's get to work.

fifthTutor.text: Let's get back to the topic of product deletion.
Naive schoolchildren can come to you and try to buy cigarettes or a bottle of beer
What do we do in such a case? That's right, we do not take the sin upon ourselves and remove such products
Be careful, scan such a product as good as breaking the law!
I won’t put you in jail, but it will have a bad effect on karma!
I hope there will be no problems with the recognition of minors?
You barely can see them from the cash register table, you can handle it, I think
Another important point, the fourth button on the screen - what do you think it does?
I will not accept theft, boy. Therefore, especially expensive goods are protected by a special "anti-theft" system.
Before scan such a product, it must be removed.

warningDoNotClick.text: Where are you clicking? It's early for you! Click again - the world will collapse!

bagTutor.text: You pull the package from the bottom and give it to the client
Of course, after opening it. We are like him..
Oh yeah, make sure that the package is opened exactly - swipe three times to be sure

couponTutor.text: So look: some customers are especially smart and got special discount coupons from somewhere.
Naturally, everything is official, I once gave them out ... I was young and stupid
It doesn't matter anymore, the important thing is that not all coupons are valid
They can try to trick you, prove that it's not as easy as it seems at first glance at you
Look carefully at the coupon expiration date and QR code
Even if a small piece of code is erased...
...very sorry, but this coupon is not valid
If any of this makes you suspicious - do not be shy to refuse the client.
To accept the coupon - scan this ill-fated QR code as a special device
And to refuse - just swipe on the coupon and it will automatically become even more unusable, hehe
Keep in mind - any mistake is worth your karma points
Click on the coupon and go! Make me money!

screenErrorTutor.text: So what do we have here?
What does it mean it's not you...
Okay, it's not going to be easy to deceive you, so listen
Our system is not perfect, it sometimes fails, the programmers messed something up, as usual
Do not waste a time, as soon as the error crashes - click reload
The client, unlike me, does not differ in angelic patience and will not wait long
Oh yes, during an error, the product is not scanned
Well, here we have such a small periodic error
The main thing other things works like clockwork! And keep up!

checkErrorTutor.text: You didn't think that rolls of checks are endless, they need to be changed periodically
So you tap the check device, remove the old roll, put in a new one
and of course, do not forget to scroll down a little so that the check grabs

endOfLevel.text: You couldn't even do this simple job.
Good luck on the job market, rookie
